title: PHPconstKeyword

metadata.description: Learn about PHPconstKeyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Create a constant and print its value:
<?php
const MY_CONSTANT = 5;
echo MY_CONSTANT;
?>

Definition and Usage
The
const
keyword is used to create constants. Unlike with the
define()
function,
constants created using the
const
keyword must be declared in the global scope.
Related Pages
Read more about constants in our
PHP Constants Tutorial
.
More Examples
Example
Create a constant and print its value:
<?php
class MyClass {
const MY_CONSTANT = 5;
}
echo 
  MyClass::MY_CONSTANT;
?>
